document.masterDocTitle: Analysis of male Leptagrion Selys, 1876 sensu lato (Odonata: Coenagrionidae) with description of four new genera and a new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Analysis of male Leptagrion Selys, 1876 sensu lato (Odonata: Coenagrionidae) with description of four new genera and a new species

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Private researcher, Rua Anibal, 216 - Jd. Coleginho, Vila Zezé, Jacareí, CEP (ZIP) 12310 - 780, São Paulo. Brazil.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Etymology :
perlongum
= per Latin for very + longum Latin for long, in reference to the very long abdomen.
